featured.text: Zoe was rather healthy when she was found, and once under the care of the orphanage she was very happy, consuming six gallons of vitamin-rich milk a day and earning a reputation as a confident, naughty and mischievous youngster.
They were kept in a 60,000-gallon tank for seven months.

definition.zh_def: 加侖：一種容量單位，等於約3.785升，常用於液體的測量。
definition.en_def: Gallon: A unit of volume measurement equal to approximately 3.785 liters, commonly used for liquids.
definition.example: The car's fuel tank can hold up to fifteen gallons of gasoline.
